name: regennexus
description: AI-controlled hardware: GPIO, robotics, sensors, cameras, and mesh networking for Raspberry Pi, Jetson, and IoT devices
author: ReGen Designs LLC

tools.name: gpio_write
tools.description: Set a GPIO pin to HIGH (1) or LOW (0)

tools.name: gpio_read
tools.description: Read the current state of a GPIO pin

tools.name: pwm_write
tools.description: Set PWM duty cycle (0-100%) for motors, LEDs, servos

tools.name: read_sensor
tools.description: Read value from a sensor (temperature, humidity, etc.)

tools.name: i2c_scan
tools.description: Scan I2C bus for connected devices

tools.name: robot_arm_move
tools.description: Move a robotic arm to specified joint positions

tools.name: gripper_control
tools.description: Open or close a robotic gripper

tools.name: device_info
tools.description: Get device details (CPU, memory, IP, temperature)

tools.name: camera_capture
tools.description: Capture a single image from a camera

tools.name: list_nodes
tools.description: List all nodes in the mesh network

tools.name: ping_node
tools.description: Ping a node and measure network latency

tools.name: send_to_node
tools.description: Send a message/command to a specific node

tools.name: broadcast_message
tools.description: Broadcast a message to all nodes

tools.name: find_by_capability
tools.description: Find nodes with a specific capability
